data.name: ZenFri Inc.
data.title: Software Developer
description: Utilized OpenAI to create an AI tour guide with personalized, context-aware replies using Unity, C# and .NET.
Architected and developed a robust backend infrastructure and RESTful API with ASP.NET MVC, MSSQL, and Docker.

data.name: Ogoki Learning Inc.
data.title: Unity Developer
description: Led the development of five mobile indigenous language-learning apps from ideation to production using Unity, C# and .NET.
Refactored and streamlined legacy projects, improving development efficiency for both new and old projects.
